text: - Hi, everybody!

To celebrate Earth Day, Super
Simple has teamed up with the

Canadian Wildlife
Federation to share videos

about some amazing creatures
that live underwater

and how we can make the
earth a healthier place
for all of us.
And there's so much that we can do.

So before we get started on
our amazing Earth Day playlist,
here are my five tips for a happy earth.
Use a reusable water bottle.
Don't use plastic water bottles.
Make sure to turn off the tap
when you're brushing your teeth.
That way we save water.

Use a metal straw
instead of a plastic one,
or skip the straw altogether.
So much plastic ends up in our oceans.

So, make sure to use
reusable grocery bags.
No more plastic
and litter-less lunches.

Instead of using plastic
wrap or plastic bags,
put your lunch in a reusable container
that you can use over and over again.
Try out these tips and enjoy our playlist
with the Canadian Wildlife Federation.
Happy Earth Day.
